viewData.name: Samsung 8.0" Galaxy Tab A 8.0 32GB Tablet (2017, Wi-Fi Only, Black)
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung 8.0" Galaxy Tab A 8.0 32GB Tablet (2017, Wi-Fi Only, Black) featuring 1.4 GHz Snapdragon 425 CPU, 2GB of RAM 8.0" IPS Multi-Touch Display. Review Samsung Tab A
viewData.long_description: The black 2017 8.0" Galaxy Tab A 8.0 32GB Tablet from Samsung delivers powerful performance and wireless content sharing in a sleek, modern design. This tablet is powered by a quad-core 1.4 GHz Snapdragon 425 processor and has 2GB of RAM. It comes equipped with 32GB of built-in storage, expandable via the microSD card slot. For high-speed Internet connectivity, Wi-Fi is built-in. Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity is also integrated for wireless pairing with compatible devices, such as headphones and other Bluetooth-enabled accessories. This Galaxy Tab A 8.0 houses an 8.0" IPS capacitive touchscreen display with a 1280 x 800 resolution for viewing all your favorite content. Additionally, the Galaxy Tab A 8.0 is equipped with a dual camera array: a front facing 5-megapixel camera and a rear-facing 8-megapixel camera with flash and HDR. A USB Type-C interface is built-in for mass storage connections and charging the device. The embedded 5000mAh battery is designed to offer hours of enjoyment before recharging is needed. The Galaxy Tab A 8.0 comes with the Android 7.1 Nougat operating system, which is designed for fluid and intuitive multi-touch navigation.
